text: Gei Abishai, tama Zeruiah, ga hagamaamaa a David, ga heebagi gi taane damana deelaa, ga daaligi a mee gii made. Digau dauwa a David gaa hai ang gi David bolo mee gii hai dana hagababa bolo ia gi hagalee hana madalia digaula gi tauwa labelaa. Digaula ga helekai, “Goe dela go di hagadagadagagee o Israel, gimaadou hagalee hiihai bolo goe gi hagalee i madau baahi.”21.17 1 Kings 11.36; Pisalem 132.17
